pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Decade: All Riders vs Dai-Shocker (2009, movie)$(br2)Used to access (Dark) Decade's $(l:decade/riders/decade#riderman)Riderman$(/l) form$(br2)Can be used to summon $(l:v3/riders/riderman)Riderman$(/l) when right-clicked as $(l:decade/riders/diend)Kamen Rider Diend$(/l)
